fontTheory.description: The typography system for this resume focuses on a balance between professionalism and readability.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts offer a good balance between readability and aesthetics, suitable for a resume.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Clear hierarchy is maintained by using different font families for headings, body text, and code blocks.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial for headings and navigation elements provide a modern and clean look, while Georgia for body text adds a touch of elegance. Courier New is used for code blocks to ensure clear distinction and readability for technical content.
